ratMessagehe:
Come with me to the rat house
he has taken your yarn ball there
onecs: Rat has kept the yarn balls in his safe inside the house
twocs: To open that safe you will need a passcode
threecs: The passcode is present in pieces in all the rooms
fourcs: Go to each room and collect the passcode to open the safe
fivecs: Hope you find the yarn balls
controlInstruction:
Use UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT arrow keys for movement. Press ENTER to perform actions
like entering room and picking items.
sizePrefInstruction:
Try different sizes using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to collect the passcode.
colorPrefInstruction:
Try different themes using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to collect the passcode.
simplifyPrefInstruction:
Try different layout using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to collect the passcode.
soundPrefInstruction:
See if you would like to see sound using UP and DOWN buttons. Press ENTER after making
the selection to collect the passcode.
simplifyPrefCol1:
CONTENT

1. Home loans
made easy

2. Cheese
Stolen

3. Matrimonial
simplifyPrefCol2:
HOME LOANS
MADE EASY
The reserve
bank of ratsville
has decided to
turn down the
interests on the
home loans.
This serves to
be a great news
for rats who
planned to get
new ratholes.
simplifyPrefCol3:
THEFT CASE
A case of cheese
theft has been
filed in Tom Street.
Stay cautious.
cookieNote: **All these settings have been saved as a cookie in your browser
